// 主页 import React, {useState } from 'react' import '../../assets/css/homepage.css' import iphone from '../../assets/images/iphone.png' import electricity from '../../assets/images/电量.png' import wifi from '../../assets/images/wifi.png' import search from '../../assets/images/搜索.png' import brightness from '../../assets/images/控制.png' import launchpad from '../../assets/images/launchpad.png' import bear from '../../assets/images/bear.png' import vscode from '../../assets/images/vscode.png' import facetime from '../../assets/images/facetime.png' import safari from '../../assets/images/safari.png' import terminal from '../../assets/images/terminal.png' import mail from '../../assets/images/mail.png' import github from '../../assets/images/github.png' function Lockscreen(props) { const [click, setClick] = useState('false') const [display,setDisplay] = useState('none') // console.log(click); // console.log(display); const OpenPopUpWindowIphone = (e) => { console.log(e) // console.log(e.target.name); if (click==='false') { setClick('true') setDisplay('block') // console.log('已打开弹窗') } else { setClick('false') setDisplay('none') // console.log('已关闭弹窗') } } const OpenPopUpWindowWifi = () => { } const ReturnLockScreen = () => { props.history.push('/') } return (
